analysis: The documents all pertain to the establishment, modification, or extension of presidential committees and commissions. These committees and commissions cover a wide array of topics, including mediation, Arctic research, water resources, international athletics, consumer interests, entitlement reform, capital budgeting, employment of the handicapped, labor disputes, and violence prevention. The documents establish the structure, membership, functions, and administrative aspects of these entities.
title: Presidential Committees and Commissions
